name: nexus/assets
description: Framework-agnostic fixed asset management with progressive delivery (SB→MB→LE)

suggest.nexus/event-stream: Event sourcing for asset lifecycle replay (recommended for audited environments)
suggest.nexus/audit-logger: Comprehensive audit trail for asset changes and transfers
suggest.nexus/workflow: Multi-level approval workflows for asset disposal and revaluation
suggest.nexus/document: Attach purchase orders, invoices, photos, and maintenance records to assets
suggest.nexus/product: For barcode/QR code asset tag generation (Tier 3)
